m_szDocSumamry: Technology advances at staggering pace Friday, Apr 15, 2016 06:00 am A   A On April 12, theoretical physicist and cosmologist Stephen Hawking held a joint press conference with Russian billionaire Yuri Milner announcing plans to build an interstellar spacecraft that will travel up to 20 per cent the speed of light. The craft comes equipped with a variety of attachments I understand nothing about – photon thrusters, a “Starchip” and a “Lightsail” – in other words, stuff straight out of Star Wars.
